TopicTitle: Sukhoi-Gulfstream s-21 replica Mach 3 private jet

Articles.Content:
Sukhoi-Gulfstream S-21 

Hi this time i have for you a beautifull aircraft that comes with a perfect combination of semplicity and replicating skill in only 115 parts.

This craft is a private jet capable of a cruising speed of more than mach 3 at over 10000 meters of altitude.

She handles really good, it's a joy to fly her in the sky.

I've tryed to keep the parts count low and still make a good replica, and i think i have done it after all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Look at the picture, isn't her the most beautifull plane have you ever seen???? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/IDePM)

SPECS:

parts:115

mass: about 30 tons

fuel load: over 1500 lt

speed: mach 1 sea level >mach 3 at altitude over 10000m

CONTROLS:

-1 toggle engines

-0 toggle ladder

I have to thanks dark jim for the idea of making a replica of this awesome plane

you can find his version (a modified version of my su-37 replica) [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117755-SUkhoi-Su-37-replica)

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/g60cmjyb6s3e48r/sukhoi_s_21_By_Eorin_1_0.craft)

Remember to comment and rep me if you like my creations, thanks =)
mhh no love for this beautifull private jet?

i use a copy of yours su-37 fuselage, both flying really nice... 

yesterday i start with my update of [Buran Energia](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104288-Energia-Buran-1-01-Space-Shuttle-Kerbal-0-90) to 1.0 -> had a need for a proper V.I.K. jet ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
